questions: How often does this workflow need to run? (e.g., hourly, daily, weekly, on-demand)
Are there different variations of this workflow for different scenarios?
What triggers should initiate this automation? (e.g., file upload, API call, schedule)
Does this process handle sensitive or confidential data? (e.g., PII, financial, medical)
What are the data retention requirements for this process?
Are there specific compliance requirements? (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, SOX)
Are there steps that require human review or approval?
What should happen if the automation encounters an error or exception?
Who should be notified when the process completes or fails?
What is the expected processing time for this automation?
How critical is this process to business operations? (low, medium, high, critical)
What are the acceptable downtime limits?
What systems or APIs does this process need to integrate with?
Are there existing authentication mechanisms for these integrations?
What data formats are expected for input and output? (JSON, XML, CSV, etc.)
What is the typical volume of data or transactions this process handles?
Are there predictable spikes in volume? (e.g., end of month, seasonal)
What is the maximum expected load the system should handle?
What websites or web pages need to be scraped?
How frequently does the target website content change?
Are there any rate limiting or anti-bot measures on the target sites?
What types of documents need to be processed? (PDF, images, scanned documents)
What specific information needs to be extracted from the documents?
What is the expected accuracy requirement for data extraction?
What is the API rate limit and how should it be handled?
Are there specific error codes or responses that need special handling?
What authentication method does the API use? (API key, OAuth, JWT)
What type of machine learning task is this? (classification, regression, clustering)
What is the expected model accuracy or performance threshold?
How often should the model be retrained or updated?
